H0.text: Lose a proton is what the atom will do when it gains an electron.

H1.text: Reduce its mass when an atom gains an electron.

H2.text: Become radioactive is what an atom will do when it gains an electron.

H3.text: An atom will have a negative charge when it gains an electron.

A4.text: An ion is an atom or molecule with a net electrical charge. The net charge of an ion is not zero because its total number of electrons is unequal to its total number of protons.
